caption.p: Retro-1 analogs PA104, PA24, and PA63 inhibit viral spread of ST-246-resistant VACV. (A) RV1 and RV2 sequence alignments showing preserved A290V and N267D mutations, respectively. Amino acid alignment of F13 of lab-grown RV1 viral isolates and RV2 compared to published ACAM strain ( Lederman et al., 2012). (B) Plaque assay images showing observable decrease in viral plaque size of RV1 and RV2 virus in the presence of 10 Î¼M PA104, PA24, and PA63.
